(That was supposed to be a formal complaint to Yan, but I'm glad it went to 
the entire RPG.  Makes it so I don't constantly stoop to some people's level 
and talk behind other people's back like some people do about me.

Jen, if I hit a base with a weapon, or if anyone does, don't say "it's 
damaged".  PLEASE put the actual damage, as in percent of the shields 
specifically.  And don't insult my name.  I really don't like it.  It's very 
childish)
